CI 11920.description: CI 11920 is classed chemically as a monoazo colour. It conforms to the formula:

CITRAL.description: Citral is the aldehyde that conforms to the formula:

CITRIC ACID.description: Citric Acid is the organic acid that conforms to the formula:

sccs.name: Position paper on the Safety of alpha-Hydroxy Acids
Updated position paper concerning consumer Safety of alpha-hydroxy acids
Opinion on Citric acid (and) Silver Citrate

CITROBACTER/SOY PROTEIN FERMENT.description: Citrobacter/Soy Protein Ferment is the product obtained by fermentation of soy protein by the microorganism Citrobacter

CITRUS AURANTIFOLIA JUICE.description: Citrus Aurantifolia Juice is the liquid expressed from the fresh pulp of the Lime, Citrus aurantifolia, Rutaceae

CITRUS AURANTIFOLIA PEEL EXTRACT.description: Citrus Aurantifolia Peel Extract is an extract of the peel of the Lime, Citrus aurantifolia, Rutaceae

CITRUS AURANTIFOLIA PEEL OIL EXPRESSED.description: "Lime Oil". Essential oil expressed from the epicarps of the Lime, Citrus aurantifolia, Rutaceae. It contains chiefly mainly D-limonene and 5% citral (low terpineol)

CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS FLOWER EXTRACT.description: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Flower Extract is an extract of the flowers of the Sweet Orange, Citrus aurantium L. var. dulcis L., Rutaceae

CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS FLOWER WATER.description: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Flower Water is an aqueous solution of the odoriferous principles of the flowers of the Sweet Orange, Citrus aurantium L. var. dulcis L., Rutaceae

CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS PEEL CERA.description: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Cera is the wax obtained from the peel of the fruit of the Sweet Orange, Citrus aurantium L. var. dulcis L., Rutaceae

CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS SEED EXTRACT.description: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Seed Extract is an extract of the seeds of the Sweet Orange, Citrus aurantium L. var. dulcis L., Rutaceae

CITRUS GRANDIS JUICE.description: Citrus Grandis Juice is the liquid expressed from the fresh pulp of the Grapefruit, Citrus grandis, Rutaceae

CITRUS GRANDIS SEED EXTRACT.description: Citrus Grandis Seed Extract is an extract of the seeds of the Grapefruit, Citrus grandis, Rutaceae

CITRUS MEDICA LIMONUM JUICE EXTRACT.description: Citrus Medica Limonum Juice Extract is an extract of the juice of the Lemon, Citrus medica L. ssp. limonum, Rutaceae

EGG.description: Egg is the entire content of chicken eggs

EGG OIL.description: Egg Oil is the oil obtained by extraction of the yolks of fresh chicken eggs.

EGG POWDER.description: Egg Powder is a powder obtained from the dried, ground whole chicken egg.

EGG YOLK EXTRACT.description: Egg Yolk Extract is the extract of chicken egg yolk.

HYDROLYZED PHAEODACTYLUM TRICORNUTUM EXT.description: Hydrolyzed Phaeodactylum Tricornutum Extract is the extract of the hydrolysate of Phaeodactylum tricornutum derived by acid, enzyme or other method of hydrolysis.

ISOBUTYL OLEATE.description: Isobutyl Oleate is the ester of isobutyl alcohol and Oleic Acid. It conforms to the formula

LEONTOPODIUM ALPINUM CALLUS EXTRACT.description: Leontopodium Alpinum Callus Extract is the extract of the callus of Leontopodium alpinum grown in culture.

OLIGOPEPTIDE-133 TRIPEPTIDE-44 PENTAPEPT.description: Oligopeptide-133 Tripeptide-44 Pentapeptide-68 is the synthetic peptide containing 34 amino acids consisting of Oligopeptide-133, Tripeptide-44 and Pentapeptide-68.

OLIGOPEPTIDE-177 TRIFLUOROACETATE.description: Oligopeptide-177 Trifluoroacetate is the trifluoroacetate salt of Oligopeptide-177.

PANTOEA VAGANS/ERYNGIUM MARITIMUM CALLUS.inci: PANTOEA VAGANS/ERYNGIUM MARITIMUM CALLUS FERMENT EXTRACT FILTRATE
PANTOEA VAGANS/ERYNGIUM MARITIMUM CALLUS.description: Pantoea Vagans/Eryngium Maritimum Callus Ferment Extract Filtrate is a filtrate of the extract of the product obtained by the fermentation of the callus of Eryngium maritimum by the microorganism Pantoea vagans.

PROPANOYLRESORCINOL.description: Propanoylresorcinol is the organic compound that conforms to the formula

TITANIUM DIOXIDE.description:
Titanium Dioxide is the inorganic oxide.
To identify the colourant meeting the requirements for labelling purposes in the EU, the INCI Name 77891 must be used.
It conforms generally to the formula:

OPINION ON Titanium Dioxide (nano form) coated with Cetyl Phosphate, Manganese Dioxide or Triethoxycaprylylsilane as UV-filter in dermally applied cosmetic
